properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.create-non-existing-users
properties.description: Defines if Curo create non existing users in Camunda

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.email-claim
properties.description: Claim which is used for email

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.enabled
properties.description: Defines if Curo user federation is active

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.first-name-claim
properties.description: Claim which is used for firstname

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.group-claim
properties.description: Claim which is used for groups

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.last-name-claim
properties.description: Claim which is used for lastname

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.load-group-from-roles
properties.description: Defines if Curo map roles to groups. If not, Curo will use the groupClaim to load a list of groups

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.print-non-existing-groups
properties.description: Defines if Curo should log non existing jwt groups

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.resource-access-claim
properties.description: Claim which is used for resource access

properties.name: curo.auth.oauth2.user-federation.resource-name
properties.description: Defines the resource from the the roles are used

properties.name: curo.camunda-user-id-pattern
properties.description: Shortcut for camunda.bpm.generic-properties.properties.userResourceWhitelistPattern *If email is used for id please use this pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9-.@_]+'*

properties.name: curo.flow-to-next.default-timeout
properties.description: Default timeout in seconds for flowToNext requests Default: 30s

properties.name: curo.flow-to-next.ignore-assignee
properties.description: Should Curo ignore the assignee for flowToNext requests Default: false

properties.name: curo.flow-to-next.interval
properties.description: How long in milliseconds should Curo wait between requests to Camunda if flowToNext got requested Default: 500ms
